Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 12:04:26

Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1F3RYS_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-11 12:24
Subject: Erratum | Call for Volunteers: Join Emirates Red Crescent in Abu Dhabi
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/mDHPs8nphEOaDH0-Rcom2Q/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/mDHPs8nphEOaDH0-Rcom2Q/550486/408F5EFE7CB00F06448E466F6D421353/pexels-cottonbro-6590928.jpg> 	

CALL FOR VOLUNTEERS


As part of the UAE Aid progamme, Emirates Red Crescent in Abu Dhabi is organising a packing initiative for ration kits to be sent to those affected in Lebanon.

The Group has been allocated 20 slots for volunteers to participate in this initiative.

Date: Sunday,13th October 2024
Time: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM
Location: Abu Dhabi Cruise Terminal, Abu Dhabi Ports, Building No. 1

The Group has been allocated 20 slots for volunteers to participate in this initiative.

Date: Sunday,13th October 2024
Time: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM
Location: Abu Dhabi Cruise Terminal, Abu Dhabi Ports, Building No. 1


SIGN UP HERE <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fforms.office.com%252fr%252f8zLrsPeQYs%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWc2rQn%252bNksDIqMQVoPWE1di8HN7xheICacM8KZA9s7F%252bYeTL408f9OkYtXrpK9km9ZosQbxQAOrg%252bm%252fnTslyTPLo71GfQlAnMs8S385UwUGZzKdIvkukC6d0uyWZzM1fRcoxuRGBSxkernmeXifThAkCOZXmZc6imaBz50QcwNOzco7cD2v9e3PH%252bnTGM1OgVNk61CmD6sGeSTbIVhjUvVjApzRnP7nrfMHZQvNLh2Uv&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C0c1ed3bcf77943e5337c08dce9ce2de4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638642318956295402%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=dzDqjHAj232i0sEcc%2Fa29eOLQIYmVFdisI5HjtSJONo%3D&reserved=0> 


Volunteers will be selected on a first-come basis and contacted by the Sustainability team for confirmation.

Stay tuned for similar volunteering opportunities in Dubai next week.

For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com
